Package org.rexcrawler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Crawler
    Crawler This object act as a Runnable implementation for the Java forkjoin framework.
    CrawlerHandler
    The handler is used by the crawler to operate on the retrieved document.
    Page
    Page request object provide common action for an HTTP request.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Reduced
    All collection fields marked with this annotation will be merged at the joining phase of the search.
